<p>Joe opens an email that confirms his biggest fear. Colleen comes back from a founder retreat with a new strategy: do everything. We talk about losing clients to AI, pivoting to strategy, and why working more isn't the answer.</p><p></p><p><b>Takeaways:</b></p><ul><li>Impact of AI on Business</li><li>Challenges in SaaS Growth</li><li>Marketing Automation Tools Real human content</li><li>Exploring new opportunities</li></ul><p></p><p><b>Chapters:</b></p><ul><li>00:00 Introduction and Client Email</li><li>07:20 Marketing Automation Tools</li><li>16:51 Challenges in SaaS Growth</li><li>23:24 Super Bowl Ads and Business Trends</li><li>29:11 Expanding Speaking Engagements and Market Reach</li><li>35:04 The Myth of Working More for Better Results</li><li>41:32 Starting a New Consulting Venture</li></ul>
